FlavorTextOption.Text: Had an identical twin that went missing years ago.
Extensive criminal record was erased by government contacts.
Has incurred high amounts of gambling debt.
Incredibly vain, known to kill people more attractive than them.
A depressed former assassin, tormented by their guilt.
Tight-fisted with money and despised by their underlings.
Feared and hated, but secretly desperate to be liked.
Openly talks about their desire to retire and be done with this.
Has recurring dreams of themselves in a past life.
Is responsible for their father's death.
Has a more famous sibling they despise.
Spent their entire life chasing means of achieving immortality.
Has an alarming number of criminal connections.
Is a lifelong bureaucrat, committed to due process above all.
Spent several years living under an assumed identity.
Is distrustful of new technology, prefers the old ways.
Was forced to watch their parents' execution.
Raised by squatters in a destitute factory.
Trained a bit as a chef, always wanted to open a restaurant.
Formerly brain washed by religious cultists.
Suffers from claustrophobia, hates being in spaceships.
Has no friends or family outside of their political party.
Failed out of medical school. Doesn't like talking about it.
Avoided military service thanks to family connections.
Excluded from a family inheritance and terribly bitter about it.
Scarred in a duel with a romantic rival. They won though.
Lost their sense of smell in an industrial accident.
Descends from minor European nobility.
Spent their youth in a Tibetan monastery.
A former wharf rat, escaped from the slums of a port city.
Had military parents, spent years moving around the solar system.
A former sailor, used to spending months alone at sea.
A career diplomat, who loves understanding all the details.
Overcame a crippling drug addiction.
Lost two toes from frostbite in a mountaineering accident.
A former engineer, easily distracted by minute details.
Badly burnt in a cooking accident as a child.
Grooms themselves to look identical to a long dead friend from their childhood.
Constantly flipping a coin of alien origin.
Has been known to violently enforce the use of proper grammar.
Insists the Precursors still walk among us in disguise.
Loves to sing, but has a dreadful sense of pitch, rhythm, and harmony.
Lost contact with their family following a long trip at relativistic speeds.
Loves to assign humiliating pet names to their advisors.
Has a terrible sense of humor, but doesn't know it because they're surrounded by sycophants.
Is guided by two dueling voices in their head, whose combined advice never fails.
Once accidentally committed an act of cannibalism.
Meticulous and organized, undertook extensive training to be an archivist.
Is menaced by anonymous death threats that arrive every day from some unknown entity.
Serves at the pleasure of a secret organization who could kill them at any moment.
Experiences synaesthesia when speaking with alien species.
Carries the skull of their former nemesis with them.
Spent decades under a vow of silence, communicating with no-one.
Was trapped on a colony ship adrift for many decades.
Diligently works every day on their autobiography.
Has a terrible stutter, and crippling fear of public speaking.
Was the only survivor of a training accident at a military academy.
Is terrified of their own reflection, and has banned all mirrored surfaces from the capital.
Trained to be a scientist but didn't have the aptitude. Secretly bitter about it.
Encountered a space faring monster when younger, is now obsessed with finding it again.
Swindled into dubious martial training as a youth, now has strange notions of 'honor.'
Due to an unknown childhood incident, refuses to be in a poorly lit room or space.
Is obsessed with genealogy, and fully convinced ancestral knowledge is real.
Loudly insists they are the reincarnation of a great leader from ancient history.
Possesses a mysterious artifact which prevents them from casting a shadow.
Was raised by their parent's enemies as a hostage.
Is the last member of an ancient bloodline.
Is quite likely the child of prophecy who will lead their people to greatness or doom.
Prefers verbal communication, even to the point of shredding documents, unread.
A merciless disciplinarian, who expects perfection from their subordinates.
Faced many accusations of having 'impure' beliefs when younger. The accusations were true.
Was once framed for the murder of a political rival.
Comes from a family which secretly backs space piracy.
Has been handed everything to them on a silver platter. Never been challenged.
A lucid dreamer, who uses their dreams to rehearse important meetings.
Secretly maintains a list of names, several already crossed off it.
Is more concerned than most with the welfare of the poorest members of society.
Narrowly escaped an arranged marriage.
Has already made a fortune and lost it.
Body covered in scars they refuse to talk about.
Never seen without a mysterious brooch of unknown origin.

A leaking coolant system forces the ship to keep the engine compartment near freezing.
Most crew members believe this ship is haunted.
The crew has been running a complex holodeck simulation nonstop for years.
Over fourteen crew members have simply disappeared since launch.
Scan anomalies suggest that this ship is being used to ship unreported goods.
The crew revere the captain of this ship as a messiah, and not a compassionate one.
The death of the ships captain led the crew to recreate him in the holodeck, and this image still leads them.
The crew is victim to unusual bouts of paranoia and delusion, though they usually pass after a few days.
Captured stowaways forced the crew to reallocate some rooms as a makeshift prison.
A life support failure killed the first crew a few hours after launch, the second crew is faring much better.
This ship's cantina is renown throughout the fleet.
An annual onboard poker tournament consumes the crews attention.
The captain has outlawed familial relations onboard, including spouses.
There is an unusual amount of young children onboard this ship.
A small recording crew is onboard this ship to immortalize the journey.
The captain is a fan of Italian opera, and subjects the crew to it on a regular basis.
